definition: eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: But for now, a symbolic moment is about to occur.
sentences.chinese: 但在眼下，一个象征性的时刻即将出现。

sentences.english: Now, Pacquiao is the hottest thing going in the world.
sentences.chinese: 眼下，帕奎奥是炙手可热的天字第一号。

sentences.english: It was now the middle of June, and the weather fine;
sentences.chinese: 眼下正是六月中旬，天清气朗。

sentences.english: So what should Beijing be doing now?
sentences.chinese: 那么，中国眼下应该怎样做呢？

sentences.english: Just now, Afghanistan needs foreign troops to undertake COIN.
sentences.chinese: 眼下，阿富汗依然需要外国军队进行平叛。

sentences.english: Fresh but not dense, it is the unique characteristic of the green color around the Namelss now.
sentences.chinese: 新鲜而不显浓郁，是眼下时节未名之绿特有的风格。

sentences.english: I'm well aware that few jobs are available at present.
sentences.chinese: 我很明白眼下基本没有什么工作好找。

sentences.english: Now boars rush in and out of the dusky surf.
sentences.chinese: 眼下，朦胧的冲浪中忽出忽进的是种猪。

sentences.english: Digital is the buzzword of the moment in communications technology.
sentences.chinese: “数码化”是眼下很时髦的通信技术用语。

sentences.english: Right now, the only person standing between you and emotional wholeness is you. Weekly healing stones: Paraiba Tourmaline, Citrine.
sentences.chinese: 眼下，唯一一个站在你和全部感情之间的人就是你了。

sentences.english: Was it a dream or is it a nightmare?
sentences.chinese: 这是一场曾经的美梦，还是眼下的噩梦？

sentences.english: At a time of tight budgets, many schools are finding that offer too good to refuse.
sentences.chinese: 在眼下预算紧俏时期，很多学校难以拒绝这一支持。

sentences.english: Right now, my wife and friends are sailing.
sentences.chinese: 眼下，我的妻子和朋友们正在航海。

sentences.english: It’s a perfection or re-interpretation of a currently hot trend.
sentences.chinese: 眼下最热潮流的趋势要么完美，要么是重新演绎。

sentences.english: So far the stalemate between the Bucks and the Yi camp continues.
sentences.chinese: 眼下，雄鹿队和易之队之间的僵局还在继续。

sentences.english: For the moment he was working as actor and horse-rider with the circus.
sentences.chinese: 眼下，他在这家马戏团当演员跑马。

definition: immediately/at once/at that moment/at the moment
top priority job/matter of vital importance
returning to our main topic,.../that said,.../again,.../in this connection/in passing/nevertheless,.../anyhow
